content.text:
# Can anyone recommend a static site CMS for non-technical users?

I know lots of people who are only using WordPress because it makes editing content simple, but *really* they don't need anything more than a simple static site and a content management system. I've seen a bunch, but they tend to fall into two categories:

- "open core" hosted solutions that seem like they'll create vendor lock-in
- completely open source solutions that assume you're a developer

Bonus points for not assuming my repository is on GitHub, but I suppose that isn't the end of the world.


#help #static-site #cms #webdev
